channel.title: Error:anyone got a fix?
channel.description:
Every time I launched BM I got this error, and when I tried to launch source SDK base 2007 it gave me the same error:
MountAppFilessysystem() failed: SteamMountAppFilessystem(218,0,0x1 c3ef5c4) failed with error 1: No default filesystems for this app
Please help :'(
